body_html: @lantiga I hadn't planned on it. But for completeness it should be there. I notice there is an unfold.c in lib/THNN that we may be able to use a start. If nothing else, the current Im2Col.c should be replaced with Fold.c and there should be an Unfold.c. I'll add that to the list of changes.

body: @lantiga I hadn't planned on it.  But for completeness it should be there. I notice there is an `unfold.c` in `lib/THNN` that we may be able to use a start.  If nothing else, the current `Im2Col.c` should be replaced with `Fold.c` and there should be an `Unfold.c`.  I'll add that to the list of changes.
